org.kepler.gui

Class KeplerContextMenuFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.vergil.toolbox.PtolemyMenuFactory
      • org.kepler.gui.KeplerContextMenuFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    diva.gui.toolbox.MenuFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeplerSchematicContextMenuFactory

    public class KeplerContextMenuFactory
extends PtolemyMenuFactory
implements diva.gui.toolbox.MenuFactory
    A factory that creates popup context menus for Kepler actors, directors, etc.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Brooke
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red

      • getOriginalMenuItemsMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.Action> getOriginalMenuItemsMap(NamedObj object,
                                                                                     boolean isWorkflow)
        get Map of name/value pairs containing menu paths of original PTII context- menu items, and their correspondign Action objects
        Parameters:
        object - NamedObj
        isWorkflow - boolean - @todo - FIXME - this is a gnarly hack because a workflow is actually a TypedCompositeActor, so if we just rely in the "instanceof" checks like we do for other context menus, this code will assume the workflow is actually an actor, and will display the actor context menu instead of the workflow one
        Returns:
        Map
